overview:
HireClix is the top provider of innovative interactive recruitment marketing strategies. We achieve our goal by delivering practical, measurable results coupled with zealous service.

The HireClix team lives and breaths interactive recruitment marketing so corporate recruiting teams can leave the specialized process of online marketing to a team of experts. There is so much going on in online marketing, social media and the world of recruiting tools, HireClix provides a turnkey solution for search engine optimization, pay-per-click marketing, interactive marketing and social media for recruiting. HireClix is driven to be your trusted advisor for anything related to interactive marketing. The new online marketing world presents organizations with the opportunity to own and build their employment brand like never before.

HireClix helps clients build their brand by taking charge of their interactive recruitment strategy. Many companies today are trying to find alternatives to typical solutions such as job boards. Most corporate recruiting organizations can not afford to find and retain an interactive marketing expert on their recruiting team.

HireClix presents corporate recruiting teams with a viable option and even more - a competitive advantage in todayâ€™s marketplace. The HireClix team is committed to interactive marketing specifically designed for recruiting. We guide you through a customized analysis of how SEO, PPC and other strategies can help drive more healthy online activity for your employment brand.
